How to see the Geminids meteor shower from New Zealand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-to-see-the-geminids-meteor-shower-from-new-zealand/SSUVW5JSXJGUDKMHUIYTYMYPHU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-to-see-the-geminids-meteor-shower-from-new-zealand/SSUVW5JSXJGUDKMHUIYTYMYPHU/ A meteor shower considered to be one of the best will peak this weekend. Thu, 12 Dec 2024 07:19:18 +0000 Stars are being seen in the sky during the Geminid meteor showers in Ratnapura, Sri Lanka, on December 14, 2023. Photo / AFP
Coroner urges lifejacket use after fishing kayaker Betero Biriauea drowned in Firth of Thames https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-urges-lifejacket-use-after-fishing-kayaker-betero-biriauea-drowned-in-firth-of-thames/W4Q2BMOWNRCXVMXKFN36GMZD6E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-urges-lifejacket-use-after-fishing-kayaker-betero-biriauea-drowned-in-firth-of-thames/W4Q2BMOWNRCXVMXKFN36GMZD6E/ Tracy NealHis body was found a week later, 60km from where he left in his kayak. Thu, 12 Dec 2024 07:00:00 +0000 A coroner has found that Betero Biriauea (inset) drowned during a kayak fishing trip on the Firth of Thames in November 2022.

Eke Panuku to go: Auckland councillors vote to abolish urban regeneration body, downsize Tātaki Auckland Unlimited https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/eke-panuku-to-go-auckland-councillors-vote-to-abolish-urban-regenesis-body-downsize-tataki-auckland-unlimited/GW633NAQ5ZCQ7PIQFZOFU5VQYY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/eke-panuku-to-go-auckland-councillors-vote-to-abolish-urban-regenesis-body-downsize-tataki-auckland-unlimited/GW633NAQ5ZCQ7PIQFZOFU5VQYY/ Bernard OrsmanAuckland Transport is the next CCO in Wayne Brown's sight.
